title: BREAKING: PM Mahinda Rajapaksa says President has NOT asked him to step down
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has said he has NO plans to resign & that President has NOT asked him to step down.
This was confirmed to News 1st by the Media Secretary to the Prime Minister.
BREAKING: PM Mahinda Rajapaksa says President has NOT asked him to step down
Ranjith Siyambalapitiya resigns, again from the post of Deputy Speaker
Opposition MPs confronted by Angry protestors after parliament sittings adjourned
